item.title: Professional Media Solution – Premium Merch Packages

item.description:
Premium Merch Packages Premium Media Solutions for Professionals and Entrepreneurs Our Premium Merch Packages contain custom tracksuits, t-shirts and caps with your […]

The post Professional Media Solution – Premium Merch Packages appeared first on Jordan Whinny - 3D Environment Artist, Graphic Designer, and Animator.
item.content:encoded:
Premium Merch Packages

Premium Media Solutions for Professionals and Entrepreneurs

Our Premium Merch Packages contain custom tracksuits, t-shirts and caps with your logo and design. The best way to stand out from the crowd.

Having you own merch makes you stand out above the competition. When your brand reaches new heights your fans can’t get enough of you. Give them something that allows them to engage with your brand. With our expert design expertise and innovative technology we are able to create unique designs that your most loyal followers will love wearing. You’ll influence will continue to grow the more you satisfy your fans needs.

Our Premium Merch package includes everything you need to grow your brand. Give your fans the attention they deserve with our premium tracksuits, t-shirts, caps and more. We will professionally design a unique logo, we shoot high quality photos that portray the best side of your brand, then we connect you to the world wide web through our website design.

These packages are designed for companies who want to transform their image. With our expert design support, you can retain complete control of your brand with our stylish merch. Add an element of intrigue and originality to your brand with our premium merchandise packages.

Heres what our packages include:

Premium Branded Tracksuits T-Shirts & Caps

Logo Design

Tech Pack

Photoshoot

Website Design

 

 

The post Professional Media Solution – Premium Merch Packages appeared first on Jordan Whinny - 3D Environment Artist, Graphic Designer, and Animator.

Premium Content Premium Media Solutions for Professionals and Entrepreneurs As an entrepreneur you face a constant battle in engaging and retaining your […]

The post Professional Media Solution – Premium Content appeared first on Jordan Whinny - 3D Environment Artist, Graphic Designer, and Animator.
item.content:encoded:
Premium Content

Premium Media Solutions for Professionals and Entrepreneurs

As an entrepreneur you face a constant battle in engaging and retaining your audience. Our Premium Media Solutions will help you retain a loyal audience by creating engaging, compelling content that resonates with users in an authentic way. With our expert editorial expertise and innovative technology we are able to create content that keeps users coming back for more.

Content is king and nowhere more so than in the Internet age. As an entrepreneur you need to be creating and distributing high-quality content on a regular basis to keep your audience engaged.

We can help you to do this by creating and distributing engaging content that is perfectly tailored to your audience. Our team of experts will work with you to get a full understanding of your business, your audience and the industry in which you operate. This allows us to create content that resonates with users and drives traffic back to your website or social media profiles.

Our Premium Content package includes:

A choice of Premium Media:

– An attractive, high-quality and professional looking brand presentation video.

– A video trailer for your website (or any other online platform).

– An animated logo intro for your website (or any other online platform).

Strategised Social Media Campaigns

Expert Copywriting for your Website or blog

Newsletters

Adjustable Extras:

– Social Branding Service

– Office Equipment Sets

– Branded Uniforms

 

 

The post Professional Media Solution – Premium Content appeared first on Jordan Whinny - 3D Environment Artist, Graphic Designer, and Animator.

item.title: Professional Media Solution – Increase Your Online Presence
item.dc:creator: JWhinny
item.description:
Increase Your Online Presence Professional and Entrepreneur Media Solution Our Social marketing package is designed to help Professionals and Entrepreneurs. Develop and […]

The post Professional Media Solution – Increase Your Online Presence appeared first on Jordan Whinny - 3D Environment Artist, Graphic Designer, and Animator.
item.content:encoded:
Increase Your Online Presence

Professional and Entrepreneur Media Solution

Our Social marketing package is designed to help Professionals and Entrepreneurs. Develop and increase your online presence on social media. Build traffic, get more leads and sell more through our monthly posts on your desired social media platforms. With this package we will design an attractive, high-quality and professional looking brand presentation video for you, as well as animated logo intro for your new website.

Your brand is everything. It’s the visual expression of your business and everything you’re trying to accomplish. We help you create an image that matches the characteristics of your business, builds on your strengths and creates a recognizable identity for customers. Boost your brand awareness, gain more recognition and get more sales through effective social branding.

Social media is a powerful tool that businesses can use to increase brand awareness and build their reputation. With the right strategy and content, you can create a following that will promote your business by word of mouth.

 

Here’s what you get with this package:

 

Brand Design

-A logo design that represents your company’s values and mission statement.

-An infographic that explains the process you use to fulfill your clients’ needs.

-A video that explains your company’s mission statement, values and philosophy.

-An animation that represents your brand and gives it a human touch.

-A business card design that represents your company’s values and mission statement.

 

Social Branding

– A Social Media Profile Design that identifies your brand to your customers on Facebook, Instagram, Youtube and more.

-Template packs for your social media posts, including background textures, icons, and more.

-Scheduled Social Media Content to increase impact, presence, and customer retention.

-A branded business website that can serve as a platform for your business to your customers.

 

A Business Website

A choice of Premium Media:

– An attractive, high-quality and professional looking brand presentation video.

– A video trailer for your website (or any other online platform).

– An animated logo intro for your website (or any other online platform).

 

Strategised Social Media Campaigns

Premium Branded Merch designs

 

The post Professional Media Solution – Increase Your Online Presence appeared first on Jordan Whinny - 3D Environment Artist, Graphic Designer, and Animator.

item.title: Small Business Media Solution – Branding your Team

item.description:
Branding Your Team Small Business Media Solution Your office is a representation of your company’s brand and professionalism. Make it look and […]

The post Small Business Media Solution – Branding your Team appeared first on Jordan Whinny - 3D Environment Artist, Graphic Designer, and Animator.
item.content:encoded:
Branding Your Team

Small Business Media Solution

Your office is a representation of your company’s brand and professionalism. Make it look and feel like you mean business with this Branding Your Team package.

You are a leader of a team, so make sure you have the best tools to lead them to success. Make your team walking billboards, with a uniform that represents your company and experience a professional environment ideal for increasing productivity among your staff. This brand identity package comes with all the essentials to make your office a vibrant space: Premium office stationary, business documents, vehicle wrapping, custom work polos and corporate hoodies – all with your brand on it.

This is a great way to brand your company and give your team the tools they need to be successful. If you want your team to feel like part of something special, then this package is for you. You will also get a free consultation with our design experts who will help you create a unique identity that represents both you and your business.

Here’s what you get with this package:

– A free consultation with our design expert

– A Premium vehicle wrap service.

–  Premium work polos and hoodies.

– Office Equipment with your brand on it.

– Branded business document templates.

– Signage for your store/office.

The post Small Business Media Solution – Branding your Team appeared first on Jordan Whinny - 3D Environment Artist, Graphic Designer, and Animator.

item.content:encoded:
Building Your Brand

Small Business Media Solution

Connect with the world and present your brand with the help of the Building Your Brand media solution.

This package includes all the essentials to build your brand, attract customers and make it stand out from others. It’s time to turn your business into something truly successful. With this package you will have all the media, videos, infographics and animations needed to represent your brand at its best. We will also design a uniform that represents your company and experience a professional environment ideal for increasing productivity among your staff.

Branding your business is important, especially when you have a lot of competition. You need to stand out from the crowd. With our Build Your Brand media package, you will get high-quality videos for your website and social media profiles. Images that depicts who you are and what your company does.

 

Here’s what you get with this package:

– A choice of Premium Media:

An attractive, high-quality and professional looking brand presentation video.
A video trailer for your website (or any other online platform).
An animated logo intro for your website (or any other online platform).

–  Social Media Posts.

– Blog Copywriting for your Website or Blog.

– Signage for your store.

– Premium Branded Hoodies.

 

 

The post Small Business Media Solution – Building Your Brand appeared first on Jordan Whinny - 3D Environment Artist, Graphic Designer, and Animator.

item.content:encoded:
Getting Business Started

Small Business Media Solution

This is a turnkey package for entrepreneurs and small business owners looking for a media solution to take you on the right path.

I will take your business to the next level with my Getting Business Start package, a business-ready solution including all the content, tutorials and technology needed to start growing your brand. This package includes all the aspects of marketing and advertisement, including blog posts, social media content, business website design and development and more. Take advantage of our Premium Media, and make videos, infomatics, or animations that impact your business. Unify your team with our bespoke Uniform design, and make your audience see you take business seriously.

It’s time to turn your business into something truly successful. With this package you will have all the media, videos, infographics and animations needed to represent your brand at its best. You can also design a uniform that represents your company and experience a professional environment ideal for increasing productivity among your staff.

 

Here’s what you get with this package:

Brand Design

-A logo design that represents your company’s values and mission statement.

-An infographic that explains the process you use to fulfill your clients’ needs.

-A video that explains your company’s mission statement, values and philosophy.

-An animation that represents your brand and gives it a human touch.

-A business card design that represents your company’s values and mission statement.

Social Branding

– A Social Media Profile Design that identifies your brand to your customers on Facebook, Instagram, Youtube and more.

-Template packs for your social media posts, including background textures, icons, and more.

-Scheduled Social Media Content to increase impact, presence, and customer retention.

-A branded business website that can serve as a platform for your business to your customers.

The post Small Business Media Solution – Getting Business Started appeared first on Jordan Whinny - 3D Environment Artist, Graphic Designer, and Animator.

item.title: Media Solution Consultation
item.dc:creator: JWhinny
item.description:
Media Solution Consultation Lets get things started Our Media Solution Consultation is a great way to get started with your business. We […]

The post Media Solution Consultation appeared first on Jordan Whinny - 3D Environment Artist, Graphic Designer, and Animator.
item.content:encoded:
Media Solution Consultation

Lets get things started

Our Media Solution Consultation is a great way to get started with your business. We work closely with you to determine the best course of action for your goals and aspirations, then create a plan that aligns with both.

Meeting with our Agency for a Media Solution Consultation will give you the opportunity to take a deeper dive into your business’s needs and goals, then develop a course of action that aligns with both your brand and budget. We’ll sit down together and discuss your goals, aspirations and budget. Then we’ll create a plan that aligns with both so that you can get started on the right foot—and make sure you have the data you need to measure your results.

It’s also a great way to get to know us better and determine if we’re the right partner for your business.

If you’re looking to broaden the scope of your brand, add motion and personality, or simply get some inspiration from our creative team, this is a great way for us to start working together.

 Heres how we start:

  1. Book a slot with us.
  2. Outline the key objectives of your business or brand
  3. We’ll work with you to develop a plan that aligns with your vision.

    We then start our plan!

  4. We research, strategize, create and execute content that will resonate with your audience and drive them towards their goals.
  5. After proofing we arrange for any printing or manufacturing to be completed.

  6. We then deliver the package finalised to you, your team, or your customers.

The post Media Solution Consultation appeared first on Jordan Whinny - 3D Environment Artist, Graphic Designer, and Animator.
